title: Facebook-Utilized Masterclass for Strengthening Social Work Practice Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social welfare practice knowledge and experience with digital device usage
context.additional_context: Process for social workers to engage in real-case-based learning with real-time mobile communication. Content designed for smartphone-only access without PCs

learning_goals: Based on SNS ethics guidelines, learners can identify three or more personal information protection issues that may arise when using Facebook for social welfare practice.
Learners can analyze community resource information collectible from Facebook and incorporate two or more findings into client support plans.
Using Facebook group features, learners can comparatively evaluate positive/negative impacts during case discussions with peer practitioners.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
